title: Essential Bold
content:
\>This new pixel font is a redesign of the old Wolfgang font, posted in this forums.   
   
\>It is more clean of pixel detais(to make it more readable). The complete character font family (6 fonts),of this proyect will be available soon.   
   
\>Please wellcome every comment, and critique this new cute Script typeface.   
   
Miguel   
   
   
 ![Essential.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414234040im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/1941.jpg)
author: Miguel Hernandez

comments.content:
I bet the "Esquire" isn't in your sample text by   
coincidence, Miguel. It looks remarkably like the   
magazine masthead. Essential is a beautiful thing.   
   
I'm continually amazed by your ability to pull   
distinct styles out of 10-12 pixels.   
   
Stephn
